tag.name: Adwords Conversion Code - Device Purchase Complete

parameter.value:
<script>
  $('a').on('touchstart', function(event) { 
    
    if (($(this).text() === 'Buy Now') || ($(this).text() === 'Port In') || ($(this).text() === 'Change Plan')) {
      
      var flag = false,
          product = '',
          clickText = '';
      
      if ($(this).attr('data-eventtrack') !== 'undefined') {
        
        if ($(this).attr('data-eventtrack').indexOf('Digi Postpaid  50') > -1) {
          flag = true;
          product = 'Digi Postpaid 50';
          clickText = $(this).text();
        }
        
        else if ($(this).attr('data-eventtrack').indexOf('Digi Postpaid  80') > -1) {
          flag = true;
          product = 'Digi Postpaid 80';
          clickText = $(this).text();
        }
        
        else if ($(this).attr('data-eventtrack').indexOf('Digi Postpaid  110') > -1) {
          flag = true;
          product = 'Digi Postpaid 110';
          clickText = $(this).text();
        }
        
      }
      
      if (flag) {
        window.dataLayer = window.dataLayer || [];
        window.localStorage.setItem('product', product);
        window.dataLayer.push({
          'event' : 'BestValuePlans-' + product + '-' + clickText
        });
      }
      
    }
    
  });
</script>

tag.name: Buy Now, Port In, Change Plan Touch Event

parameter.value:
<script>
  
  $('a').on('touchstart', function(event) {
    if ($(this).text() === 'Buy Now') {
      window.dataLayer = window.dataLayer || [];
      window.dataLayer.push({
        'event' : 'FB_Pixel_AddtoCart_BuyNow',
        'category' : $(this).text()
      });
    }
    
    else if ($(this).text() === 'Port In') {
      window.dataLayer = window.dataLayer || [];
      window.dataLayer.push({
        'event' : 'FB_Pixel_AddtoCart_PortIn',
        'category' : $(this).text()
      });
    }
    
    else if ($(this).text() === 'Change Plan') {
      window.dataLayer = window.dataLayer || [];
      window.dataLayer.push({
        'event' : 'FB_Pixel_AddtoCart_ChangePlan',
        'category' : $(this).text()
      });
    }
  });

</script>

<script>
  //to fire the pixel multiple times
  function multiFirePixel(j, productId, productName, productCategory, transactionId){
          var iaPixel  = new Image();
          iaPixel.src = "https://invol.co/aff_l?offer_id=1198&adv_sub="+transactionId+"&adv_sub2="+productId+"&adv_sub3="+productName+"&adv_sub4="+productCategory+"&counter="+j;
  }

  var purchaseObj, productObj, transactionId, productCategory, productId, productName;

  purchaseObj = {{dls_puchaseObj_dl}};
  productObj = {{dls_puchaseObj_dl}}.products;
  transactionId = {{dls_puchaseObj_dl}}.actionField.id;
  len = productObj.length;

  //in case of multiple prodcuts
  if(len > 1){
      for(var i = 0 ; i < len ; i++){

        multipleQuantity = productObj[i].quantity;
        productId = productObj[i].id;
        productName = productObj[i].name;
        productCategory = productObj[i].category;

        if (multipleQuantity > 1) {
            for (var j = 0; j < multipleQuantity; j++) {
              //fire the pixel multiple times with same values
              multiFirePixel(j, productId, productName, productCategory, transactionId);
            }
        }
        else{
            //fire the pixel with different values
            multiFirePixel(i, productId, productName, productCategory, transactionId);
        }
      }
    }

  //for single product
  else{

    productId = productObj[0].id;
    productName = productObj[0].name;
    productCategory = productObj[0].category;

    //if single product has multiple quantity
    if(productObj[0].quantity > 1){

      var multipleQuantity = productObj[0].quantity;
      for (var i = 0; i < multipleQuantity ; i++) {
        //fire the pixel mutltiple times
        multiFirePixel(i, productId, productName, productCategory, transactionId);
      }
    }

    //if single product has single quantity
    else{
      //fire the pixel single time
      multiFirePixel(0, productId, productName, productCategory, transactionId);
    }
  }
</script>
